(FLIRTY) #You're welcome, Mateo. Any time! (PLATONIC) (break)friendship Mateo 15\speak Mateo "Just a friend. I have a lot to work on before that's something I can consider.$28#$b#But, I'd be lying if I said you weren't on my mind a terrible lot - so go ahead and take that thought home with you.$30"\emote farmer 20(break)friendship Mateo 15\speak Mateo "Thank you, @. I don't know what I'd do without you guiding me along. Head back to the Fern Islands, probably...$1"\emote farmer 32/pause 500/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/speak Mateo "I'll do better. Not just for you, but for myself, too. Time to start making an effort.$32"/message "{{i18n:Events.S&S.Ch1.4H.Message.1}}"/playSound discoverMineral/end
